title: Early Bronze Age Begins
description: Bronze tools and early civilizations emerge.

title: Construction of the Pyramids of Giza
description: The Pyramids of Giza are built in Egypt.

title: First Olympic Games in Greece
description: The first recorded Olympic Games are held in Olympia, Greece.

title: Assassination of Julius Caesar
description: Julius Caesar is assassinated in Rome.

title: Fall of the Western Roman Empire
description: The Western Roman Empire officially falls.

title: Magna Carta Signed
description: English barons force King John to sign the Magna Carta.

title: Columbus Reaches the Americas
description: Christopher Columbus arrives in the Americas.

title: Martin Luther Posts 95 Theses
description: Martin Luther sparks the Protestant Reformation.

title: Galileo's Telescope Observations
description: Galileo uses a telescope to study the stars.

title: American Declaration of Independence
description: The thirteen American colonies declare independence from Britain.

title: French Revolution Begins
description: The French Revolution begins in Paris.

title: End of U.S. Civil War
description: The American Civil War ends, abolishing slavery.

title: Edison Invents the Light Bulb
description: Thomas Edison invents a practical electric light bulb.

title: Start of World War I
description: World War I begins in Europe.

title: Great Depression Begins
description: The Great Depression devastates the global economy.

title: End of World War II
description: World War II ends with Allied victory.

title: MLK 'I Have a Dream' Speech
description: Martin Luther King Jr. delivers his famous speech.

title: Moon Landing
description: Apollo 11 lands the first humans on the Moon.

title: Fall of the Berlin Wall
description: The Berlin Wall falls, ending the Cold War division.

title: Collapse of the Soviet Union
description: The Soviet Union collapses into independent states.

title: September 11 Attacks
description: Terrorist attacks strike the United States.

title: Global Financial Crisis
description: The world suffers a major financial collapse.

title: Curiosity Rover Lands on Mars
description: NASA's Curiosity rover successfully lands on Mars.

title: COVID-19 Pandemic
description: A global pandemic disrupts daily life and economies.

title: ChatGPT Released to the Public
description: OpenAI's ChatGPT is released to the public.
